fullplot: The popular children's tale about a donkey, a dog, a cat and a rooster who are on their way to the slaughterhouse when they get a lucky break and escape.
plot: The popular children's tale about a donkey, a dog, a cat and a rooster who are on their way to the slaughterhouse when they get a lucky break and escape.
title: The Fearless Four
writers: Jacob Grimm (fairy tale "The Bremen Town Musicians")
Wilhelm Grimm (fairy tale "The Bremen Town Musicians")
